Issue.creator: tkuhrt
Issue.summary: App Developers Guide does not use consistent prompt to represent CLI container
Issue.description: In https://sawtooth.hyperledger.org/docs/core/releases/latest/app_developers_guide/docker.html, *root@75b380886502:/#* is used to represent input into the CLI container and *$* is used to represent input into the host computer in the _Confirming Connectivity_ section. However, in the ___Creating and Submitting Transactions with_ intkey section, a *$* is used even though these commands should be entered from the CLI container. Recommend using consistent prompts.
